reviewText: even if you don't have cancer, we all benefit from the life lessons in these books, it helps with chronic pain, sleep disorders, overall health and choosing what you should eat and eliminate from our diets and lives.

reviewText: My husband and I stopped eating meat many years ago. We resorted to eating organic fruits and vegetables (organic, as best as we can tell...because we are aware that there are unscrupulous people selling products labeled organic when they are not). We have decided after learning about the Gerson therapy to go "juicing" full time. Dr. Gerson is greatly maligned by the "powers that be" which does not surprise me. How would conventional medicine and the big pharmaceutical industry make money if everyone follows the sensible and much more affordable therapy Dr. Gerson came up with? I no longer take all the prescribed medications I used to take, and I have never felt so well in my life. If you are currently healthy, you may not consider looking at this therapy which mainstream medicine likes to label as a quackery, but when you reach a certain age when chronic illnesses start to get your attention and your stalwart refusal to look at anything beyond mainstream medicine starts to crack, consider looking at the Gerson therapy. Leaning on  all the astounding information I have gained from reading three to four hours daily, I have no qualms making Dr. Gerson's therapy a major part of my life. The presentation of the therapy is very well done in the DVD's. Dr. Gerson is in the same boat as Dr. Simoncini and Dr. Burzynski. If you have not seen "Burzynski, the Movie", and its sequel, you need to see it. It is gut wrenching to realize that the powers that be will stop at nothing to protect their billions of dollars in income from all the prescription drugs, etc.  I am very thankful Charlotte Gerson is working hard to continue passing on the knowledge she learned from her father. I am in the healthcare industry, but I put no stock in it. I have extinguished long ago my belief in mainstream medicine, mainstream science, and specially...mainstream media. My hope is that everyone wakes up to what is really going on in our world because what most people see as our reality IS NOT.
summary: Not for the "Intellectuals" Who Refuse to  See Beyond Mainstream Anything

reviewText: I have had Breast Cancer, and Strokes which regular treatment in the U.S. has robbed me of my health.  I heard of Gerson Therapy and wanted to look for an alternative to Big Pharma, which nearly killed me through treatment.  I read the book, and listened to the Gerson Therapy DVD's and was excited to learn that there is a way through nutrition to help my body to cure itself through proper eating and juicing.  I refuse to repeat my past mistakes and rely on the medical establishment to "cure" me.  Do you ever wonder why those with other natural alternatives have to work in Mexico in order to help people?  It is against the law when you have cancer to use anything other than chemo and radiation because it fills the pockets of Big Pharma; a billion dollar business.  They get wealthy on you being sick; sad, but true.  Now I have an alternative to being healthy, and I loved the DVD's and book.  I am so pleased I found these items through Amazon.com

ABSOLUTELY!!I love the information that i have personally obtained from this DVD set and the books that I read so far from Charlotte Gerson.Awesome!

reviewText: This is a good introduction to understand how to apply the Gerson Therapy at home.  Still need the book, but a lot of good information here.  They now have on-demand online classes too at their website.  The third video is difficult to watch because the camera man is a rookie for that DVD only, but the content in it is good.

reviewText: If you are sick or know someone who struggles with a life threatening or just annoying illness, you must look in to the The Gerson Therapy. Amazing documentary and helpful resource for cancer and other diseases. Before you purchase, look on YouTube for many parts of this DVD collection. I bought it because I loan it out to friends who don't have Netflix or computer friendly. Life saving!
